sentence.Network_en: Clarity is crucial to persuading our fellowman of the moral superiority of personal liberty.
sentence.Network_cn: 清晰对于说服我们那些以道德至上来诠释个人自由的同胞至关重要.

sentence.Network_en: This simple man of genius gave his intelligence and heart to his fellowman.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位淳朴的天才把自己的智慧和心血献给了人类.

RelatedPhrase.word: but who's that fellowman of hers

list.key: but who's that fellowman of hers
list.exp: 但谁又是她的那个跟随者
